attributes.action: Withdraw the last British troops from Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that the IRA has ceased its paramilitary/terrorist activity, the case for maintaining a UK military presence in Northern Ireland is now looking rather redundant.
Therefore, the last remaining act of de-militarising Northern Ireland should be the withdawal of the UK military forces curently based there.
